mapper.select: SELECT id_country idLocation, name locationName, lon longitude, lat latitude FROM country WHERE country.status=1
SELECT name FROM country WHERE country.status=1 AND id_country = #{countryId}

SELECT a.name as nameLocationCovid, (b.date) as dateLocationCovid, (b.death_cases) as deathCases, (b.confirmed_cases) as confirmedCases, (b.vaccinated) as vaccinated, (b.cumulative_cases) as cumulativeCases, (b.recuperated) as recuperated
FROM country a, covid_data b, country_covid_data d
WHERE b.date <= #{dateCovid} and a.id_country = d.id_country and d.id_country = #{countryId} and b.id_covid_data = d.id_covid_data and b.status = 1
SELECT id_country FROM country WHERE status=1 AND name = #{country}

SELECT a.name as nameLocationCovid, b.date as dateLocationCovid, b.death_cases as deathCases, b.confirmed_cases as confirmedCases, b.vaccinated as vaccinated, b.cumulative_cases as cumulativeCases, b.recuperated as recuperated
FROM country a INNER JOIN country_covid_data cdc on cdc.id_country=a.id_country INNER JOIN covid_data b on b.id_covid_data=cdc.id_covid_data WHERE a.id_country = #{countryId} and b.date <= #{dateCovid} and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 and cdc.status = 1 ORDER BY b.date DESC LIMIT 1;
